doc.title: Gardener's Joke
doc.plot: Two employees of a rich merchant are "spooning" in the garden and seat themselves in a shady nook behind a clump of bushes to indulge in osculation. The gardener spies them and turns on the hose. The lover grapples with him and they fall to the ground with the gardener underneath. The fair one turns the hose on them but her valiant lover receives the most water. Rich.
